title: Apple supplier Foxconn halts operations in Shenzhen as China locks down tech hub - CNN
content: Apple supplier Foxconn halts operations in Shenzhen as China locks down tech hub  CNN
description: Foxconn, one of Apple's biggest suppliers, has suspended operations in Shenzhen as China locks down the technology hub and several other regions to contain the country's worst Covid-19 outbreak in two years.
